Name: Video Editor Tycoon
About the game: A CLASSIC TYCOON GAME WITH A DIFFERENT THEME The Video Tycoon Editor aims to create a familiar yet original experience for players of all ages, combining classic tycoon gameplay with the company's exclusive video editing management theme. Can you generate enough money to keep your struggling business standing? Will you be able to retain employees? Do you think you have what it takes to hire as many employees as possible? MINIMUM START Start with just 5,000 of money and choose from an almost infinite number of employees to edit video contracts to constantly increase your company's money. As you level up the company, popularity increases, allowing you to choose better employees and even turn down more candidates Choose from 20 different employees, where each of their styles and skills is unique to grow in your company EXPLORE AND EXPAND Complete different combinations of missions and difficulties! Choose from over 20 different character combinations and over 11 unique mission to unlock new content! BE THE LARGEST VIDEO EDITING COMPANY You will have to prove yourself against your intellect that you are capable of running a business Score achievements with every action you take and compete against yourself to get the maximum score and win! EASILY EXTENDABLE Since most of the Video Editor Tycoon data is loaded from simple JSON files and Spritesheets, when the game starts, it is extremely extensible and fast. FEATURES More than 20 employees to design your company. More than 10 unique contracts with different stories. 2 unique items to accelerate the growth of the company and employees..
Developers: Bruno Ferreira Lopes da Silva Teixeira de Queiroz,Victor Pusanosky Okada,Claudio Correa Dias
